doc:
Peter Clayton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Clayton 0 Peter James Clayton (25 June 1927, Sydenham, London – 10 August 1991, Sydenham, London) was an English jazz presenter on BBC radio, jazz critic, and author. From October 1968 until his death in August 1991, Clayton presented jazz recordings, interviews, studio performances, and live performances on BBC Radio 1, 2, and 3, as well as the BBC World Service. He co-authored several books about music and jazz with Peter Gammond and was a frequent contributor to jazz magazines. Peter_James_Clayton ( 25_June_1927 , Sydenham , London – 10_August_1991 , Sydenham , London ) was an_English_jazz_presenter on BBC_radio , jazz_critic , and author . From October_1968 until his_death in August_1991 , Clayton presented jazz_recordings , interviews , studio_performances , and live performances on BBC_Radio_1_,_2 , and 3 , as_well_as the_BBC_World_Service . He co-authored several_books about music_and_jazz with Peter_Gammond and was a_frequent_contributor to jazz_magazines .
